definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: mariner (loan-word from As. malaḫu Dl:HWB 412 cf. Id:Pro1. 178; Hal:ZA iv.1880, 53; so also Aram. maloh.o0 (v. Brock.), whence Ar. mala0h.un Frä:221);—pl. [[מַלָּחִים]] Jon 1:5, Ez Eze 27:29; [[מַלָּחַיִח]] Ez Eze 27:27; [[מַלָּחֵיהֶם]] v:Eze 27:9 (Ba:NB 49 Anm. 3);—mariners, sailors of ship going to Tarshish Jon 1:5 (cf. [[רַב הַחׂבֵל]] v:Jon 1:6); to Tyre Ez Eze 27:9, cf. v:Eze 27:27, v:Eze 27:29 (‖[[חׂבְלִים]]).
